class.name: IsisMgsMocWideAngleCamera
class.brief: Camera model for MGS/MOC Wide Angle
class.description: This class handles the camera model for the MGS/MOC wide angle instrument. To create an IsisMocWideAngle camera object use the IsisCameraManager class and invoke the Camera method passing in a moc na cube.

function.name: IsisMgsMocWideAngleCamera
function.description: Constructs a camera model for the MGS MOC wide angle camera

argument.name: lab
argument.description: A PVL object containing valid MGS MOC wide angle labels
